Package fr.curie.cd2sbgnml.graphics

Classes to deal with pure geometry problems.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GeometryUtils
    Util class containing only static methods, dealing with geometry objects.
    Glyph
    Something that can be placed on a map, that is not a link.
    Link
    Something that links glyphs together.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AnchorPoint
    The possible anchor points as defined by CellDesigner (except the CENTER value that is implicit in CellDesigner if no anchor point is defined, or sometimes when it is set to INACTIVE).
    CdShape
    All the general shapes a CellDesigner glyph can take.
    SbgnShape
    General shapes used by SBGN.

Package fr.curie.cd2sbgnml.graphics Description

Classes to deal with pure geometry problems. Used to represent maps as only basic glyphs and links. Glyphs are bboxes with shapes, Links are sets of points. Main class here is GeometryUtils which contains all the core functions to deal with shapes, links and glyphs.
